short_summary: Public Health Agency of Canada has a requirement to procure a DNA microarray scanner system.
description: Public Health Agency of Canada has a requirement to procure a DNA microarray scanner system for use by the Public Health Agency of Canada.
full_summary:
# DNA Microarray Scanner System Tender Announcement

## Overview
As per this request for proposal (RFP), the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking a supplier to provide a DNA microarray scanner system.

### Procurement Details
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4104281981
* **Publication Date**: 2023-07-28
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-08-16T14:00:00 (Expired)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-09-21
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2027-08-30

### Description
The PHAC requires a DNA microarray scanner system that will be used for DNA sequencing and analysis. This equipment will enable the agency to conduct accurate and efficient genetic testing.

### Key Specifications
According to the UNSPC classification, the procurements falls under the following categories:
* 41105600 Deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) sequencing products
* 41106100 Deoxyribonucleic acid (DNA) analysis kits

### Trade Agreements
This RFP is subject to various trade agreements, including:
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery
The procurement will support operations at the Public Health Agency of Canada in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

### Contracting Entity and Contact Information
* Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact person: Oana Lee
* Contact email: oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17011093?extsite=MTcwMTEwOTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
